job.title: Software Engineer, Integration Engineering
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Hospital & Health Care
job.description: stronguAbout UsbrbrustrongOne Medical is a primary care platform challenging the industry status quo by making quality care more affordable accessible and enjoyable But this isnt your average doctors office Were on a mission to radically transform healthcare which means tackling the frustrations of everyone involved  from patients and providers to employers and health networksbrbrAcross the country our members enjoy seamless access to comprehensive care at more than 90 locations across thirteen cities and counting as well as 247 access to virtual care powered by intelligent uses of technology In addition to a directtoconsumer membership model we work with more than 7000 companies to provide One Medical health benefits to their employeesbrbrOn January 31 2020 we marked a milestone with our public listing on Nasdaq but our work is far from over As we continue to grow and broaden our impact were building a diverse driven and empathetic team while working hard to cultivate an environment where everyone can thrivebrbrstronguThe OpportunitybrbrustrongThis is a handson technical role in partnership with our Enterprise Product team and our Client Services team These individuals will be focused on enterprises integrated with our One Medical for Business offerings This includes improving onboarding ongoing management and reporting for these services In this role you will provide technical expertise to both internal and external teams and be building tools and automation to make these processes efficient and scalable This will involve regular client collaborations improving documentation and helping to troubleshoot technical issues that may arisebrbrstronguWhat Youll Work OnbrustrongulliCollaborate with our Client Services team to onboard enterprise clients to One Medicals healthcare offeringsliliProvide guidance technical expertise with multiple internal and external enterprise client teams to facilitate the integration of One Medicals systemsliliPartner with our Enterprise Product team to build automation and tools to improve the efficiency of client onboarding and supportliliTroubleshoot technical issues encountered by our enterprise clients as they integrate with One Medicals systemsbrliulstronguWhat Youll Needbrustrongulli2 years of software engineering experiencelili2 years of experience in Integration Engineering Technical Support or Sales Engineering rolesliliExcellent communication skills to collaborate with partners across the organization including client servicesaccount management marketing and finance teamsliliExcellent debugging and problem solving skillsbrliulstrongNot required but would be great if you also hadbrstrongulliPrior experience in health care andor employee benefits spaceliliExperience working on B2B2C products and servicesliliExperience with our enterprise tools including JIRA Salesforce Slack and othersliliExperience with our application stack including Ruby on Rails Angular MySQL and AWSliliExperience with server andor clientside performance tuningbrliulstronguBenefits Designed To Aid Your Health And WellnessbrbrustrongTaking care of you todaybrulliPaid sabbatical after 5 and 10 yearsliliEmployee Assistance Program  Free confidential advice for team members who need help with stress anxiety financial planning and legal issuesliliCompetitive Medical Dental and Vision plansliliFree One Medical memberships for yourself your friends and familyliliPreTax commuter benefitsliliPTO cash outs  Option to cash out up to 40 accrued hours per yearbrliulProtecting your future for you and your familybrulli401K matchliliOpportunity to participate in company equity programsliliCredit towards emergency childcareliliCompany paid maternity and paternity leaveliliPaid Life Insurance  One Medical pays 100 of the cost of Basic Life InsuranceliliDisability insurance  One Medical pays 100 of the cost of Short Term and Long Term Disability InsurancebrliulOne Medical is an equal opportunity employer and we encourage qualified applicants of every background ability and life experience to contact us about appropriate employment opportunitiesbrbr
